Name: 烈火冲锋The charge is the fire
About the game: Note: 1.Non-English characters including Cyrillic in the user path are not supported. 2.Your system input method must be switched to English input method when playing the game. 3.OpenAL is required for this game. 4.The resolution of the game is 1440*900 currently. Game introduction 1.It's a 3D First Person Shooting Game. 2.This is a game about the anti-fascist war in China during World War II. 3.It's also a simulator of the charge at World War II . 4.It's a small game. 5.It's an impossible game to win! Game background A corner of a rare charge battle in the battle of Shanghai in the early days of the anti-Japanese war in China during WWII. Game development direction Add weapons, enrich the story, adjust the parameters according to the feedback of users, if possible, add bayonet fighting with the enemy. The game features Artificial intelligence, Chinese dubbing. What can players do? 1.Playing a Chinese soldier in World War II. 2.Charging at the Japanese positions with your comrades. 3.Shooting at the Japanese soldiers requires that the main character is alive, which is often difficult. Quest To get as close as possible to the enemy positions (Shake the enemy) and kill the enemy soldiers, but...... Good luck to you! How to win? Normally you can't win, the only thing you can do is to make the failure to look better. What if you don't like the game? 1.Ignoring me. 2.This game allows ample time for refunds. The revenue of this game For the creation of a sequel. Why did I developed this game? 1.Hatred of the aggressor and all those who help the aggressor. 2.Showing how difficult it was for China to win the Anti-Fascist War in WWII. 3.For studying. 4.I want to play this game. About the author(me). I have a stable job, but it is not in the IT industry, let alone in the industry related to video game development. All the skills of creating games are self-taught in my spare time, because I like playing video games and prefer to create video games. My dream is to create my own games. This game is the first one I created by myself. There will inevitably be many shortcomings due to poor technology. I hope you can correct me and I will continue to work hard. About the sequel The sequel will be an FPS+RPG, and the story will be an extension of this game's story, with a richer content and more Chinese elements. And I really hope you all have fun!
